SELECT F1.SESS_REQ_UUID AS SESS_REQ_UUID , F1.CRET_DT AS CRET_DT , F1.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , F1.APP_ID AS APP_ID , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT APP_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_APP_M WHERE APP_ID =TRIM(F1.APP_ID) ), '-') AS APP_NM , F1.USER_ID AS USER_ID , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M WHERE USER_ID =TRIM(F1.USER_ID) ), '-') AS USER_NM , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT ORG_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M WHERE USER_ID =TRIM(F1.USER_ID) ), '-') AS ORG_ID , F1.SESS_ID AS SESS_ID , F1.USER_IP AS USER_IP , F1.SRV_IP AS SRV_IP , F1.SRV_PORT AS SRV_PORT , F1.REQ_DT AS REQ_DT , F1.END_DT AS END_DT , F1.REFE_INFO AS REFE_INFO , CASE WHEN F1.RSLT_CD='S' THEN '성공' ELSE '실패' END AS RSLT_CD , F1.RSLT_DESC AS RSLT_DESC , F1.CONN_TYPE AS CONN_TYPE , F1.LOGIN_TYPE AS LOGIN_TYPE FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_SESS_L F1
AND TO_CHAR(F1.REQ_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{fromData}

SELECT F1.OBJ_REQ_UUID AS OBJ_REQ_UUID , F1.CRET_DT AS CRET_DT , F1.CRETR_ID AS CRETR_ID , F1.APP_ID AS APP_ID , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT APP_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_APP_M WHERE APP_ID =TRIM(F1.APP_ID) ), '-') AS APP_NM , F1.USER_ID AS USER_ID , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT USER_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M WHERE USER_ID =TRIM(F1.USER_ID) ), '-') AS USER_NM , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT ORG_ID FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_USER_M WHERE USER_ID =TRIM(F1.USER_ID) ), '-') AS ORG_ID , F1.SESS_ID AS SESS_ID , F1.USER_IP AS USER_IP , F1.SRV_IP AS SRV_IP , F1.SRV_PORT AS SRV_PORT , F1.OBJ_TYPE_ID AS OBJ_TYPE_ID , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT OBJ_TYPE_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_TYPE_M WHERE OBJ_TYPE_ID =TRIM(F1.OBJ_TYPE_ID) ), '-') AS OBJ_TYPE_NM , F1.OBJ_ID AS OBJ_ID , NVL((SELECT DISTINCT OBJ_NM FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_OBJ_M WHERE OBJ_ID =TRIM(F1.OBJ_ID) ), '-') AS OBJ_NM , F1.REQ_DT AS REQ_DT , F1.END_DT AS END_DT , F1.REFE_INFO AS REFE_INFO , CASE WHEN F1.RSLT_CD='S' THEN '성공' ELSE '실패' END AS RSLT_CD FROM O_DATAEYE_META.PEN_SYS_OBJ_L F1
AND TO_CHAR(F1.REQ_DT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{fromData}
